text: aur hum ne bani israel ko darya se paar utaar diya, pas un logo ka ek khaum par guzar hoa jo apne chandh butho se lage baite thein, kehne lage aye Mosa! hamaare liye bhi ek maboodh aisa hee muqarrar kar di jiye! jaise un ke ye maboodh hai, aap ne farmaaya waqeyi tum logo mein badi jahaalath hai
